=== Current Issues ===
Port replicator audio output doesn't work.

Port replicator network doesn't work when laptop is plugged "hot" into the port replicator. (network card not detected)
Port replicator network begins producing system errors when laptop is unplugged "hot" from the port replicator.

Port replicator USB doesn't work when laptop is plugged "hot" into the port replicator.

Speedstep appears to sit at 1.2Ghz (laptop is actually 1.33Ghz)
